game.name: MageGuard Tower
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: MageGuard Tower is a roguelike tower defense game where thousands of physics-driven monsters surge toward your crystal. Build, unlock, and adapt across procedurally generated maps in a relentless struggle for survival.
